snippet.title: The Lost F-Zero Games Are Restored & Playable
snippet.description:
In this video, Did You Know Gaming takes a look at the two F-Zero games for the Super Famicom (SNES) Satellaview add-on that were once lost to time, but have now been faithfully rebuilt and restored by a team of dedicated modders. And you can even play them right now.

The game is available on Internet Archive:
https://archive.org/details/bs_f-zero_deluxe_v1.0

Follow DYKG on:
Twitter: http://bit.ly/2oOavs2
Instagram: http://bit.ly/2oO4jjA
Facebook: http://bit.ly/2nIrFp9
Website: http://bit.ly/NpYDbD

Special Thanks to FlibidyDibidy, GuyPerfect, LuigiBlood, Porthor, and PowerPanda.

Research/Writing by Dylan Mansfield
Video Editing by TheCartoonGamer
Voice Over by Tony of @hard4games 

Sources/Further Reading:
“BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2.” F-Zero Wiki, 23 Dec. 2023, https://mutecity.org/wiki/BS_F-Zero_Grand_Prix_2.
GuyPerfect. Personal Interview. 29 Oct. 2023.
Yarwood, Jack. “The Incredible Story Of Satellaview, Nintendo's Satellite Modem SNES Add-On.” Time Extension, 30 Dec 2023, https://www.timeextension.com/features/the-incredible-story-of-satellaview-nintendos-satellite-modem-snes-add-on.
"Nintendo aims high with “Satellaview”". Edge Magazine. Issue 5. May 1996. pp. 18-19.
“Gaming on the highway.” Edge Magazine. Special Edition 1996 Essential Hardware Guide. Autumn 1995. pp. 116-121.
“DO NOT ADJUST YOUR SETS! NINTENDO LAUNCH BS-X SATELLITE SYSTEM”. Nintendo Magazine System (UK). Issue 33. Aug 1995, p. 8.
Hodgson, Dave. “THE RETURN OF F-ZERO” Nintendo Magazine System (UK). Issue 55. Apr 1997, p. 11.
“PAK WATCH: F-Zero Returns.” Nintendo Power. Issue 94. Mar 1997. p 103.
@LuigiBlood. “...huh. Interesting. F-Zero 99 has a bunch of unused files... including brand new tracks? One of them actually reuses the name of one of the Satellaview exclusive ones… All of them are mostly just Mute City I placeholders though, with some different backgrounds.” Twitter, 16 Sept  2023 11:21 p.m., https://twitter.com/LuigiBlood/status/1703096847227551864.

#snes #fzero #nintendo #supernintendo #superfamicom #satellaview
